languages.text: Строгое следование законам и приверженность Вольного Торговца Имперскому кредо принесли {mf|ему|ей} великую славу. Каждый планетарный оборот на каждом мире Простора тысячи молитв возносились к Золотому Трону, славя имя Защитни{mf|ка|цы} Коронуса.

Strict abidance by the law and devotion to the Imperial Creed brought great renown to the Rogue Trader. Every planetary turn on every world in the sector, thousands of prayers were offered up to the Golden Throne praising the name of the Guardian of the Koronus Expanse.
languages.original_text: Строгое следование законам и приверженность Вольного Торговца Имперскому кредо принесли {mf|ему|ей} великую славу. Каждый планетарный оборот на каждом мире Простора тысячи молитв возносились к Золотому Трону, славя имя Защитни{mf|ка|цы} Коронуса.

traits.locale_text: Strict abidance of the law and devotion towards the Imperial Creed brought great renown to the Rogue Trader. Every planetary revolution on every world of the Expanse, thousands of prayers were offered up to the Golden Throne, praising the name of the Protector of the Koronus.

Strict abidance of the law and devotion towards the Imperial Creed brought great renown to the Rogue Trader. Every planetary revolution on every world of the Expanse, thousands of prayers were offered up to the Golden Throne, praising the name of the Protector of the Koronus.

Strict abidance by the law and devotion toward the Imperial Creed brought great renown to the Rogue Trader. In every planetary turn on every world of the Expanse, thousands of prayers were offered up to the Golden Throne praising the name von Valancius, the Protector of Koronus.

Strict abidance by the law and devotion toward the Imperial Creed brought great renown to the Rogue Trader. In every planetary turn on every world of the Expanse, thousands of prayers were offered up to the Golden Throne praising the name von Valancius, the Protector of Koronus.

Strict abidance by the law and devotion to the Imperial Creed brought great renown to the Rogue Trader. Every planetary turn on every world in the sector, thousands of prayers were offered up to the Golden Throne praising the name of the Guardian of the Koronus Expanse.

Strict abidance by the law and devotion to the Imperial Creed brought great renown to the Rogue Trader. Every planetary turn on every world in the sector, thousands of prayers were offered up to the Golden Throne praising the name of the Guardian of the Koronus Expanse.

languages.text: 行商浪人严格遵守法律，对帝国信仰始终保持无比忠诚，这使得{mf|他|她}声名显赫。在科罗努斯扩区的每个世界，每颗转动的行星上，都有无数献给黄金王座的祷告，赞美着冯·瓦兰修斯家族的行商浪人，科罗努斯扩区的守护者。
languages.original_text: Strict abidance by the law and devotion to the Imperial Creed brought great renown to the Rogue Trader. Every planetary turn on every world in the sector, thousands of prayers were offered up to the Golden Throne praising the name of the Guardian of the Koronus Expanse.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人严格遵守法律，对帝国信仰始终保持无比忠诚，这使得{mf|他|她}声名显赫。在科罗努斯扩区的每个世界，每颗转动的行星上，都有无数献给黄金王座的祷告，赞美着冯·瓦兰修斯家族的行商浪人，科罗努斯扩区的守护者。

languages.text: Strikte Einhaltung der Gesetze und bedingungslose Hingabe zum imperialen Glauben brachten {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} großen Ruhm ein. Einmal pro Planetenrotation wurden auf allen Welten des Sektors tausende von Gebeten zum Goldenen Thron gesprochen, in denen der Name {mf|des Beschützers|der Beschützerin} der Koronus-Ausdehnung gepriesen wurde.
languages.original_text: Strict abidance by the law and devotion to the Imperial Creed brought great renown to the Rogue Trader. Every planetary turn on every world in the sector, thousands of prayers were offered up to the Golden Throne praising the name of the Guardian of the Koronus Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Strikte Einhaltung der Gesetze und bedingungslose Hingabe zum imperialen Glauben brachten {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} großen Ruhm ein. Einmal pro Planetenrotation wurden auf allen Welten in der Ausdehnung tausende von Gebeten zum Goldenen Thron gesprochen, in denen der Name von Valancius gepriesen wurde, {mf|der Beschützer|die Beschützerin} von Koronus.

languages.text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} acquit une remarquable renommée grâce à son respect absolu de la loi et à sa dévotion envers le Credo Impérial. À chaque tour planétaire, sur chaque monde du secteur, on adressait au Trône d'Or des milliers de prières louant {name} von Valancius, {mf|le protecteur|la protectrice} des Étendues de Koronus.
languages.original_text: Strict abidance by the law and devotion to the Imperial Creed brought great renown to the Rogue Trader. Every planetary turn on every world in the sector, thousands of prayers were offered up to the Golden Throne praising the name of the Guardian of the Koronus Expanse.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} acquit une remarquable renommée grâce à son respect absolu de la loi et à sa dévotion envers le Credo Impérial. À chaque tour planétaire, sur chaque monde des Étendues, on adressait au Trône d'Or des milliers de prières louant {name} von Valancius, {mf|le protecteur|la protectrice} de Koronus.

languages.text: El respeto total a la ley y la devoción al credo imperial otorgaron un gran renombre a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Con cada rotación planetaria de cada mundo del sector, se ofrecían miles de plegarias al Trono Dorado alabando el nombre de{mf|l| la} Guardi{mf|án|ana} de Koronus.
languages.original_text: Strict abidance by the law and devotion to the Imperial Creed brought great renown to the Rogue Trader. Every planetary turn on every world in the sector, thousands of prayers were offered up to the Golden Throne praising the name of the Guardian of the Koronus Expanse.

traits.locale_text: El respeto total a la ley y la devoción al credo imperial otorgaron un gran renombre a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Con cada rotación planetaria de cada mundo de la Extensión, se ofrecían miles de plegarias al Trono Dorado alabando a von Valancius, Protector{mf||a} de Koronus.

languages.text: 法の厳格な遵守と帝国信条集への献身は、自由開拓者に偉大な名声をもたらした。星域内のどの惑星のどんな自転においても、何千もの祈りが黄金の玉座に捧げられ、コロヌス・エクスパンスの守護者の名を讃えた。
languages.original_text: Strict abidance by the law and devotion to the Imperial Creed brought great renown to the Rogue Trader. Every planetary turn on every world in the sector, thousands of prayers were offered up to the Golden Throne praising the name of the Guardian of the Koronus Expanse.

traits.locale_text: 法の厳格な遵守と帝国信条集への献身は、自由開拓者に偉大な名声をもたらした。星域内のどの惑星のどんな自転においても、何千もの祈りが黄金の玉座に捧げられ、コロヌス・エクスパンスの守護者の名を讃えた。

languages.text: Hür Tacir, kanunlara bağlılığı ve İmparatorluk İtikadı'na adanmışlığıyla nam saldı. Sektördeki her bir dünyada her gezegensel devirde, Altın Taht'a Koronus Enginliği'nin Muhafızı'nın adını yücelten dualar okunmaya başladı.
languages.original_text: Strict abidance by the law and devotion to the Imperial Creed brought great renown to the Rogue Trader. Every planetary turn on every world in the sector, thousands of prayers were offered up to the Golden Throne praising the name of the Guardian of the Koronus Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Hür Tacir, kanunlara bağlılığı ve İmparatorluk İtikadı'na adanmışlığıyla nam saldı. Sektördeki her bir dünyadaki her bir gezegensel devirde, Altın Taht'a, Koronus Enginliği'nin Muhafızı'nın adını yücelten dualar okunmaya başladı.
